mapper.select: SELECT SALE_DATE, NVL(SUM(SALE_PRICE), 1) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sqlWeekDate}) AND SYSDATE GROUP BY SALE_DATE ORDER BY SALE_DATE
SELECT SALE_DATE, SUM(SALE_PRICE) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sqlMonthDate}) AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{sqlMonthDate})) GROUP BY SALE_DATE ORDER BY SALE_DATE
SELECT SALE_DATE, SUM(SALE_PRICE) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') "LAST_MONTH" FROM DUAL) AND SYSDATE GROUP BY SALE_DATE ORDER BY SALE_DATE
SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-14, '월') FROM DUAL) AND (SELECT NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-8, '일') FROM DUAL) AND SALE_CAT_NO = #{saleCatNo}
SELECT NVL(SUM(SALE_PRICE),1) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{findDate}) AND SYSDATE AND SALE_CAT_NO = #{saleCatNo}
SELECT SUM(SALE_PRICE) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{findDate}) AND LAST_DAY(#{findDate}) AND SALE_CAT_NO = #{saleCatNo}
SELECT NVL(SUM(SALE_PRICE),1) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_DATE BETWEEN (SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') "LAST_MONTH" FROM DUAL) AND SYSDATE AND SALE_CAT_NO = #{saleCatNo}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT SALE_NAME, SUM(SALE_PRICE) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_CAT_NO = #{saleCatNo} GROUP BY SALE_NAME ORDER BY "SALE_SUM" DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 6
SELECT NVL(SUM(SALE_PRICE),1) "SALE_SUM" FROM SALE WHERE SALE_DATE = TO_DATE(SYSDATE)
SELECT S.*,P.PRO_NO FROM SALE S,PRODUCT P WHERE SALE_NAME = PRO_NAME ORDER BY SALE_NO DESC
